pages.text: 22|47|Kare-ra wa anata ni, subayai chōbatsu o motomeru. Daga arrā wa yakusoku ni somuka renai. Hontōni omo no omoto ni okeru tsuitachi wa, anata gata no keisan suru Chitose ni ataru.
22|48|Ware wa, ikaga ni ōku no aku o okonau toshi o yūyo shi, sorekara korera o shobatsu shita kotodearou ka. Kaeri-sho wa ware no moto ni aru nodearu.
22|49|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Hitobito yo watashi wa, anata gata ni hakkiri keikoku suru (tame tsukawasa reta)-shadearu.'
22|50|Shinkō shite zenkō ni isoshimu mono wa, o yurushi to eiyo aru kate o atae rareru.
22|51|Daga waga shirushi o munashiku suru yō ni tsutomeru mono wa gōka no nakamadearu.

22|52|Anata izen ni ware ga tsukawashita shito ya yogen-sha demo, nanika nozomi o motsu to, akuma ga sono yokubō o sosonokashita monodeatta. Daga arrā wa, akuma no yūwaku o mu ni sa re, o jibun no shirushi o kengo ni nasa reta. Hontōni arrā wa zenchi ni shite eimei de ara reru.
22|53|Kare wa, akuma no yūwaku de, kokoro ni yamai no aru mono, kokoro no gankona-sha o kokoromi nasa reru. Hontōni aku o okonau mono-tachi wa,(shinri kara) tōku kakehanareru.

22|54|Mata chishiki o atae rarete iru-sha-tachi wa, kono (kuruān) ga anata no nushi kara no shinridearu koto o shiri, kokoro o kenkyo ni shite sore o shinjiru. Hontōni arrā wa, shinkō suru mono-tachi o tadashī michi ni michibika reru katadearu.
22|55|Shinkō no nai mono wa sore ni tsuite utagai o daki tsudzukeyou. (Shinpan no) toki ga, totsuzen kare-ra ni osoikakaru ka, saiyaku no hi no chōbatsu ga kuru made wa.
